home.introduction.paragraph.message: Is fóntais shimplí, chumraithe é **PreMiD** a ligeann duit a bhfuil á dhéanamh agat ar an ngréasán a thaispeáint i do Discord anois ag imirt stádais.
home.introduction.paragraph.description: First phrase that users read on our website

home.examples.playingagame.description: Discord Rich Presence -> Playing a game

home.examples.timestamp.description: Discord Rich Presence -> time left; {0} will be replaced with the current timestamp -> is a variable

home.examples.timestamp2.description: Discord Rich Presence -> time elapsed; {0} will be replaced with the current timestamp -> is a variable

home.examples.status.playing.description: Discord Rich Presence -> small image text;

home.examples.status.live.description: Discord Rich Presence -> small image text;

home.examples.status.browsing.description: Discord Rich Presence -> small image text;

home.features.heading.message: Beidh grá agat ar na gnéithe seo!

home.features.presencesystem.description.message: Chruthaíomar ár síneadh ar bhealach a ligeann duit Presences a chruthaigh daoine eile a chur leis agus a úsáid agus iad a bhainistiú inár síneadh!

home.features.simpleInterface.descriptio.message: Tuirseach de chomhéadain úsáideora casta? Sin an fáth gur chruthaíomar agus a dhéanaimid iarracht ár Chomhéadain a choinneáil chomh simplí agus chomh húsáideach agus is féidir le gnéithe tábhachtacha mar:

home.features.quickSupport.description.message: Tá rud éigin briste, ag cur tonna earráidí chugat nó gan a bheith ag obair? Cabhróimid leat fáil réidh leis na saincheisteanna sin ar ár bhfreastalaí Discord, chruthaíomar ár gcóras tacaíochta féin freisin a chinnteoidh go réiteofar do shaincheist a luaithe is féidir.

home.languageSelector.tippy.description: Tippy content of the language selector.
